verses.name: Revelation 5:10
verses.text: And hast made us unto our God kings and priests: and we shall reign on the earth.

verses.name: Revelation 5:11
verses.text: And I beheld, and I heard the voice of many angels round about the throne and the beasts and the elders: and the number of them was ten thousand times ten thousand, and thousands of thousands;

verses.name: Revelation 5:12
verses.text: Saying with a loud voice, Worthy is the Lamb that was slain to receive power, and riches, and wisdom, and strength, and honour, and glory, and blessing.
